markdownRemark.html: The ​Japanese word koishii means "dear" out "beloved." In Japanese characters, koishii is 恋しい (こいしい). <h3>Example</h3>Tokidoki us ga koishiku narimasu.時々家が恋しくなります。<strong>Translation:</strong>I had homesick three took qv v while.                                                     citecite each article                                FormatmlaapachicagoYour CitationAbe, Namiko.
